purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 转)
Pictophonetic: 專 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
Antonyms: 停
purpleculture_examples:
轉向 [ zhuàn xiàng ]: to get lost; to lose one's way
轉動 [ zhuàn dòng ]: to rotate (about an axis); to revolve; to turn; to move in a circle; to gyrate
轉悠 [ zhuàn you ]: to roll; to wander around; to appear repeatedly
轉文 [ zhuǎi wén ]: to parade by interspersing one's speech or writing with literary allusions; Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 wen2]
轉變 [ zhuǎn biàn ]: to change; to transform; shift; transformation; Classifiers: 个
轉移 [ zhuǎn yí ]: to shift; to divert or distract (attention etc); to change; to transform; metastasis (medicine); to evacuate (people)
轉化 [ zhuǎn huà ]: to change; to transform; isomerization (chemistry)
轉身 [ zhuǎn shēn ]: (of a person) to turn round; to face about; (of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
轉換 [ zhuǎn huàn ]: to change; to switch; to convert; to transform

heisig_chinese_memo: If your specialty is in cars then you must know how to rotate tires, a standard procedure.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: a specialist (專) could make the car (車) roll
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The car's specialty, or, what makes the car special, is the tires that rotate.  It would be nothing without those wheels!
humanum_full_description_en:
From " car " to " special " sound, the original meaning is transshipment and migration. "Said Wen": "Fun also. From the car, special voice." "Yi Zhou Shu‧ Da Kuang": "Food is poor, and widows are not abandoned."

" Turn " can mean turning, that is, changing the direction of action. "Songs of the Chu-Li Sao": "If the road is wrong, turn to the left, referring to the West Sea as the time." Wang Yi's note: "Turn, and go." Hong Xingzu's supplementary note: "Bou Zhou is outside the Northwest Sea, from right to left. Therefore, it refers to Xihai as the future."

" Turn " also means change. change. "Zhuangzi·Tian Zifang": "There is only one husband, Confucianism is a public servant, and the public is called to ask questions about the affairs of the country, and he is never poor."

" Turn " also means escape. "Guanzi·Fafa": "The order is done, the prohibition is stopped, and the people dare not change their strength." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Turn, avoid it."

" Turn " also means shaking and wandering. "Songs of the Chu: Calling the Soul": "The light wind turns to the Hui, and it is more chonglan." Wang Yi's note: "Turn, shake."

" Turn " can be used as an adverb, meaning that it is on the contrary. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Gufeng": "Fear and fear, Wei Yu and women. Turn peace and happiness, women to them." Gao Heng's note: "When it comes to peace, you abandon me instead."

" Turn " can also be used as a quantifier, and each level of honor is called a turn. Tang Hanyu's "Shun Zong Record III": "Civil and military officials merged with state officials and county officials as the father and the latter, and awarded him two honors."

" Turn " is also pronounced "Zhi Yanqi", which means rotation. "Yuefu Poetry Collection‧Miscellaneous Songs II‧Tragedy Songs‧Ancient Ci": "The heart can't be said, the wheels in the heart turn."
humanum_short_description_en: From " car " to " special " sound, the original meaning is transshipment and migration.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「專」聲，本義為轉運、移徙。《說文》：「運也。从車，專聲。」 《逸周書‧大匡》：「糧窮不轉，孤寡不廢。」

　　「轉」可表示轉向，即改變行動的方向。《楚辭‧離騷》：「路不周以左轉兮，指西海以為期。」王逸注：「轉，行也。」洪興祖補注：「不周在西北海之外，自右而之左，故曰指西海以為期也。」

　　「轉」也表示改變。改變。《莊子‧田子方》：「獨有一丈夫，儒服而立乎公門，公即召而問以國事，千轉萬變而不窮。」

　　「轉」還表示逃避。《管子‧法法》：「上令盡行，禁盡止，引而使之，民不敢轉其力。」尹知章注：「轉，猶避也。」

　　「轉」亦表示搖動、飄蕩。《楚辭‧招魂》：「光風轉蕙，氾崇蘭些。」王逸注：「轉，搖也。」

　　「轉」可用作副詞，表示反而、反倒。《詩‧小雅‧谷風》：「將恐將懼，維予與女。將安將樂，女轉棄予。」高亨注：「到了安樂時，你反而拋棄了我。」

　　「轉」也可用作量詞，勛級每升一級叫一轉。唐韓愈《順宗實錄三》：「文武常參并州府縣官子為父後者，賜勳兩轉。」

　　「轉」還有「陟兖切」的讀法，表示旋轉。《樂府詩集‧雜曲歌辭二‧悲歌行‧古辭》：「心思不能言，腸中車輪轉。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「專」聲，本義為轉運、移徙。

(Simplified: 转)

  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 專 [ zhuān ] concentrated, specialized; to monopolize
①旋轉；打轉。［例］峯迴路轉。——《醉翁亭記》。［例］下者飄轉。——唐·杜甫《茅屋爲秋風所破歌》。［合］轉丸(轉動的彈丸。比喻升降沉浮不定)；轉燈(走馬燈)；機器轉子團團轉；砂輪轉得快；地球繞着太陽轉。
②繞過。［例］由千佛山腳下往東，轉過山坡，竟向南去。——《老殘遊記》。
③迷路或迷失方向。［例］暈頭轉向。
④(口）∶轉悠。［例］公園關了門，只好去轉文殊院。——《大波》。
⑤旋轉的一整圈。［例］每分鐘3600轉。
轉向 [ zhuàn xiàng ]: to get lost; to lose one's way
轉動 [ zhuàn dòng ]: to rotate (about an axis); to revolve; to turn; to move in a circle; to gyrate
轉悠 [ zhuàn you ]: to roll; to wander around; to appear repeatedly
轉文 [ zhuǎi wén ]: to parade by interspersing one's speech or writing with literary allusions; Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 wen2]
①旋動：轉動。轉瞬(轉動眼睛，形容時間短促)。
②改換方向或情勢：轉身。轉變。轉彎。
③不直接的，中間再經過別人或別的地方：轉送。轉達。轉發。轉運。週轉。
④遷移：轉移。轉業。
⑤量詞，古代勳位每升一級稱“一轉”：“策勳十二轉，賞賜百千強。”

轉身 [ zhuǎn shēn ]: (of a person) to turn round; to face about; (of a widow) to remarry (archaic)

Kanshudo mnemonic:a specialist (專) could make the car (車) roll
Chinese: If your specialty is in cars then you must know how to rotate tires, a standard procedure.
Meaning: rotate
Hanzi: 转
Story: The car's specialty, or, what makes the car special, is the tires that rotate. It would be nothing without those wheels!
Kind: traditional

從「 車 」，「 專 」聲，本義為轉運、移徙。《說文》：「運也。从車，專聲。」 《逸周書‧大匡》：「糧窮不轉，孤寡不廢。」 「 轉 」可表示轉向，即改變行動的方向。《楚辭‧離騷》：「路不周以左轉兮，指西海以為期。」王逸注：「轉，行也。」洪興祖補注：「不周在西北海之外，自右而之左，故曰指西海以為期也。」 「 轉 」也表示改變。改變。《莊子‧田子方》：「獨有一丈夫，儒服而立乎公門，公即召而問以國事，千轉萬變而不窮。」 「 轉 」還表示逃避。《管子‧法法》：「上令盡行，禁盡止，引而使之，民不敢轉其力。」尹知章注：「轉，猶避也。」 「 轉 」亦表示搖動、飄蕩。《楚辭‧招魂》：「光風轉蕙，氾崇蘭些。」王逸注：「轉，搖也。」 「 轉 」可用作副詞，表示反而、反倒。《詩‧小雅‧谷風》：「將恐將懼，維予與女。將安將樂，女轉棄予。」高亨注：「到了安樂時，你反而拋棄了我。」 「 轉 」也可用作量詞，勛級每升一級叫一轉。唐韓愈《順宗實錄三》：「文武常參并州府縣官子為父後者，賜勳兩轉。」 「 轉 」還有「陟兖切」的讀法，表示旋轉。《樂府詩集‧雜曲歌辭二‧悲歌行‧古辭》：「心思不能言，腸中車輪轉。」
From " car" to " special" sound, the original meaning is transshipment and migration. "Said Wen": "Fun also. From the car, special voice." "Yi Zhou Shu‧ Da Kuang": "Food is poor, and widows are not abandoned." " Turn" can mean turning, that is, changing the direction of action. "Songs of the Chu-Li Sao": "If the road is wrong, turn to the left, referring to the West Sea as the time." Wang Yi's note: "Turn, and go." Hong Xingzu's supplementary note: "Bou Zhou is outside the Northwest Sea, from right to left. Therefore, it refers to Xihai as the future." " Turn" also means change. change. "Zhuangzi·Tian Zifang": "There is only one husband, Confucianism is a public servant, and the public is called to ask questions about the affairs of the country, and he is never poor." " Turn" also means escape. "Guanzi·Fafa": "The order is done, the prohibition is stopped, and the people dare not change their strength." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Turn, avoid it." " Turn" also means shaking and wandering. "Songs of the Chu: Calling the Soul": "The light wind turns to the Hui, and it is more chonglan." Wang Yi's note: "Turn, shake." " Turn" can be used as an adverb, meaning that it is on the contrary. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Gufeng": "Fear and fear, Wei Yu and women. Turn peace and happiness, women to them." Gao Heng's note: "When it comes to peace, you abandon me instead." " Turn" can also be used as a quantifier, and each level of honor is called a turn. Tang Hanyu's "Shun Zong Record III": "Civil and military officials merged with state officials and county officials as the father and the latter, and awarded him two honors." " Turn" is also pronounced "Zhi Yanqi", which means rotation. "Yuefu Poetry Collection‧Miscellaneous Songs II‧Tragedy Songs‧Ancient Ci": "The heart can't be said, the wheels in the heart turn."

[①]［zhuǎn］
［《廣韻》陟兗切，上獮，知。］
“转1”的繁体字。
(1)车运；转运。
(2)翻转。
(3)辗转。
(4)弃尸。
(5)移动。
(6)返回。
(7)转向，改变行动的方向。
(8)变化；改变。
(9)逃避。
(10)摇动；飘荡。
(11)按着歌声节拍跳舞。
(12)转调。
(13)诵，读。
(14)卖；转让。
(15)传递；转交。
(16)翻，成倍的增加。
(17)迁职。
(18)再耕。
(19)缠绕。
(20)书法术语。用笔圆转回旋之意。
(21)旧时诗文结构章法方面的术语。
(22)量词。道家炼丹的次数叫转。
(23)量词。勋级每升一级叫一转。
(24)副词。反而；反倒。
(25)副词。渐渐；更加。
(26)通“囀”。婉转发声。亦指婉转的歌声。
(27)用同“賺”。
[②]［zhuàn］
［《廣韻》知戀切，去線，知。］
“转2”的繁体字。
(1)装衣甲的口袋。《左传·

轉字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　轉； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1248第17
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】陟兗切【正韻】止兗切，?專上聲。【說文】轉運也。【前漢·韓安國傳】轉粟輓輸以爲之備。　又【廣韻】動也，旋也。【詩·周南】輾轉反側。【註】輾者轉之半，轉者輾之周。　又【韻會】軫轉，無窮也。【揚子·太?經】軫轉其道。　又【廣韻】知戀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】株戀切，?專去聲。凡物自轉則上聲，以力轉物則去聲。　又車上衣裝曰轉。【左傳·襄二十四年】踞轉而鼓琴。

Basic explanation of words
turn
zhuǎn
turn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuǎn］
["Guang Yun" Zhi Yan cut, upright, know. ]
Traditional characters for "转1".
(1) Vehicle transportation; transshipment.
(2) Turn over.
(3) Toss and toss.
(4) Abandon the corpse.
(5) Move.
(6) Return.
(7) Turn to change the direction of action.
(8) Change; change.
(9) Escape.
(10) Shake; float.
(11) Dance to the rhythm of singing.
(12) Transition.
(13) Recite, read.
(14) Sell; transfer.
(15) Pass; forward.
(16) Turn over, increase exponentially.
(17) Relocation.
(18) Plowing again.
(19) Winding.
(20) Calligraphy terms. Use the pen circle to turn around.
(21) The terminology of the old poetry structure.
(22) Quantifiers. The number of Taoist alchemy practices is called Zhuan.
(23) Quantifiers. Each level of honor is called a turn.
(24) Adverbs. On the contrary; on the contrary.
